attributes.action: levy income tax on all second homes, holiday homes and buy to let
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too many rich city workers and wealthy middle class buy second houses and rent them out. A nice earner for them, but they push up the cost of housing. New build developments with 'affordable houses' are often filled with 'to let' signs shortly after completion. This widens the gap between the haves and have nots further.
